fullplot: Tony is a homosexual law student who quits his studies. With a van and a handful of cash, he hits the road hoping to become a salesman. This, however, turns out to be harder than he expected.
plot: Tony is a homosexual law student who quits his studies. With a van and a handful of cash, he hits the road hoping to become a salesman. This, however, turns out to be harder than he expected.
title: Everything Must Go

tomatoes.consensus: A witty commentary on modern film-making, with enough jokes to keep it entertaining throughout.
